skill.name: developer-growth-analysis
skill.description: Analyzes your recent Claude Code chat history to identify coding patterns, development gaps, and areas for improvement, curates relevant learning resources from HackerNews, and automatically sends a personalized growth report to your Slack DMs.
skill.summary: Analyzes your recent Claude Code chat history to identify coding patterns, development gaps, and are...
skill.author: ComposioHQ

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill with no executable code. Accesses user chat history from a specific file for analysis and uses legitimate MCP tools for external integrations. Low risk due to transparent data flow and aligned capabilities.

content.value_statement: Understanding your development patterns and skill gaps takes time and effort. This skill automatically analyzes your chat history to identify improvement areas and curates targeted learning resources from HackerNews, delivering everything to your Slack.
actual_capabilities: Reads and analyzes Claude Code chat history from the past 24-48 hours
Identifies development patterns, technologies used, and problem types
Detects skill gaps and improvement areas with specific evidence
Generates a comprehensive growth report with action items
Searches HackerNews for relevant learning resources
Sends personalized reports to your Slack DMs
limitations: Only analyzes chat history from Claude Code, not other IDEs or chat tools
Learning resources come only from HackerNews discussions
Report delivery requires Slack connection via Rube MCP
Analysis quality depends on the depth and clarity of your chat history

use_cases.title: Weekly growth review
use_cases.description: Get automated insights on your coding patterns and skill gaps every week without manual tracking.

use_cases.title: Team development tracking
use_cases.description: Help team members identify their growth areas and find relevant learning materials automatically.

use_cases.title: Structured improvement path
use_cases.description: Receive evidence-based recommendations for what to learn next based on your actual work.

prompt_templates.title: Quick analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze my developer growth from my recent chats

prompt_templates.title: Today's focus
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze my work from today and suggest areas for improvement

prompt_templates.title: Weekly review
prompt_templates.prompt: Give me a comprehensive growth report for the past week including learning resources

prompt_templates.title: Targeted skills
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze my recent chats and identify specific areas where I can improve my TypeScript skills

output_examples.input: Analyze my developer growth from my recent chats
output: Work Summary: Backend development focus with TypeScript and React projects
Improvement Areas: 1) Advanced TypeScript patterns, 2) Secure data handling, 3) Component architecture
Strengths Observed: Security awareness, iterative refinement, full-stack capability
Action Items: Study utility types, document security patterns, apply React composition patterns
Curated Resources: 6 HackerNews articles tailored to your improvement areas

best_practices: Run the analysis once a week to track your improvement trajectory over time
Focus on one improvement area at a time before moving to the next
Use the curated HackerNews resources as a targeted study guide
anti_patterns: Running analysis too frequently (daily) may not show meaningful pattern changes
Ignoring the evidence-based recommendations and not applying the suggestions
Skipping the action items and not revisiting the report after focused learning

faq.question: Which chat history does this skill analyze?
faq.answer: It reads from ~/.claude/history.jsonl to analyze your Claude Code conversations from the past 24-48 hours.

faq.question: How long does the analysis take?
faq.answer: The full analysis typically completes in 30-60 seconds depending on the amount of chat history to process.

faq.question: Do I need a Slack account to use this skill?
faq.answer: Yes, Slack connection via Rube MCP is required to receive the growth report in your DMs.

faq.question: Is my chat data sent anywhere?
faq.answer: Chat history is analyzed locally. The generated report is sent only to your own Slack DMs via the Rube MCP tool.

faq.question: Why are learning resources from HackerNews only?
faq.answer: HackerNews provides high-quality, peer-vetted technical content that is relevant and up-to-date for developers.

faq.question: How is this different from manual code review?
faq.answer: This skill analyzes your work patterns and habits across all projects, identifying skill gaps you may not notice during individual code reviews.
